Title: Data Scientist - Machine Learning Engineer
Job_Description:
United States - Work From Home

First things first, we’re a global health service company dedicated to helping people improve their health, well-being and sense of security. But we don’t just care about your well-being, we care about your career health too. That’s why when you work with us, you can count on a different kind of career – you’ll make a difference, learn a ton, and share in changing the way people think about healthcare.

Now on to the good stuff… what you’ll do:
Pharmacy Machine Learning Engineers uses specialized depth and experience to develop and modify complex software application programs supporting Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence initiatives. This position will be responsible for advocating, educating and partnering with teams across the enterprise to develop best practices around the preferred technology stacks, as well as implementing Machine Learning applications and proof of concepts (POC). As a member of the newly formed Pharmacy Machine Learning Engineering team, This position will also create detailed specifications, conduct quality assurance reviews of peer's application programming.

Create Machine Learning Solutions to achieve organizational objectives

Consult to product development team’s best practices related to Machine Learning application development and Machine Learning/AI-specific infrastructure technology stacks (e.g. GPU-based systems, A.I. in public cloud, etc).

Apply best practice software engineering principles towards the development of applications, in order to productionalize Machine Learning models produced by Data Scientists and ML Engineers

Leverage Big Data and Data Science tools (i.e. one or more of SQL, Hadoop, Spark, Python, R) to both source and work with data

Ensure quality of technology delivery of multiple vendors’ technology solutions for multiple concurrent projects or programs for an application family.

Deliver solutions for multiple concurrent projects

Identify and implement process enhancement opportunities associated with supporting the application area.

Implement actions to increase ESI and vendor partner knowledge on team.

Serve as SME for components of the team.

Provide technical guidance to projects/programs for complex components of a multiple technology suites.

Develop standard practices, components, guidelines for use of complex technology components.

Resolve urgent and high production incidents.

Determine root cause of problems and drive resolution.

Work on other projects as assigned.


Bachelor’s degree and 3+ years of relevant experience or a Master’s degree in a relevant field or the equivalence of education and experience

Good understanding of relational and nosql database concepts and data processing

data structures, algorithms, performance complexity, and implications of computer architecture on software performance (e.g., I/O and memory tuning)

version control systems (i.e. Git, Github) and workflows, and ability to write production-ready code

Complete understanding and wide application of technical principles, theories and concepts in the field.

Ability to provide and implement technical solutions to a wide range of difficult problems.

Solutions are innovative, thorough, practical and consistent with organizational objectives.

Strong customer service focus.

Familiarity with health care or PBM industry.

Familiar with working in a vendor partner model.

Ability to work a flexible schedule to accommodate project deadlines.

Demonstrated ability to prioritize work load and meet project deadlines.

Adaptability and willingness to lean new tools and applications.

Ability to adapt in a dynamic work environment and make independent decisions.

Demonstrated ability to work collaboratively across project team

If you will be working at home occasionally or permanently, the internet connection must be obtained through a cable broadband or fiber optic internet service provider with speeds of at least 10Mbps download/5Mbps upload.

For this position, we anticipate offering an annual salary of 95,900 - 159,800 USD / yearly, depending on relevant factors, including experience and geographic location.

This role is also anticipated to be eligible to participate in an annual bonus plan.

We want you to be healthy, balanced, and feel secure. That’s why you’ll enjoy a comprehensive range of benefits, with a focus on supporting your whole health. Starting on day one of your employment, you’ll be offered several health-related benefits including medical, vision, dental, and well-being and behavioral health programs. We also offer 401(k) with company match, company paid life insurance, tuition reimbursement, a minimum of 18 days of paid time off per year and paid holidays. For more details on our employee benefits programs, visit Life at Cigna .

Title: Data Scientist - Machine Learning Engineer
Job_Description:
This position is part of the Enterprise DevOps Shared Service team focused on creating service offerings that enable development teams to improve continuous delivery of applications by applying DevOps best practices, processes, and tools across the organization. This position will drive strategic direction, design, and innovation of the Enterprise DevOps products and service offerings. This role reports to the Enterprise DevOps Lead and is part of the broader Cloud Hosting organization supporting Cigna.
As an Architect Director, this role will act as a Chief Engineer examining the current Enterprise DevOps ecosystem to generate and incubate new solutions while solidifying our existing service offerings. This role will be responsible for partnering with Enterprise DevOps and Cloud Hosting leadership to form, drive, and execute the strategy, roadmap, and architecture for the destination state of the Enterprise DevOps organization. This role will define, build, guide, and oversee architectures that lead the technical direction of DevOps across the enterprise. The candidate will have Human Resources and mentoring responsibility for a small team of architects within the broader DevOps organization.


Evaluate the current Enterprise DevOps ecosystem to determine the core products and service offerings to deliver best in class CI/CD pipeline capabilities
Partner with Enterprise DevOps leadership and engineering to develop and implement a robust and achievable architectural roadmap for all DevOps ecosystem products and service offerings.
Architect for business value outcomes by developing architecture blueprints and patterns and implementing architectures that align with best-in-class design and software engineering principles.
Develop and promote engineering best practices, guidelines, and tools for the Enterprise development communities.
Create holistic roadmaps for Source Code Management & Version Control, CICD Orchestration, Artifact repositories, configuration Management, Pipelines and Scanning
Work with business, solution, and integration architects across technology groups to ensure the architecture strategies align with the demands of the business.
Identify and lead technical research and analysis and make recommendations on potential approaches to achieve business and IT capabilities.
Act as a thought leader and mentor to the Enterprise DevOps engineering team to promote organic growth and recruit new talent
Be vigilant in staying current on industry data and analytics trends and emerging technologies.
Ability to create a strong partnership with Enterprise Architecture to ensure solutions support destination state architectures for the Enterprise


Bachelor’s Computer Science, Engineering, or related discipline strongly preferred
Extensive experience in a software engineering or architecture environment
Extensive years of architecture experience, including web, and other digital or distributed platforms
Advanced analytical skills, judgement and expertise to create solutions to the most complex problems focusing on the business requirements
Strong technical leader who can roll-up their sleeves when necessary
Excellent verbal and written communication skills. Able to understand, document, and describe complex technical subjects
Comfortable with ambiguity and willing to take principled bets on new technologies
Ability to “think big” and challenge conventional wisdom regarding technology refresh and hype
Ability to establish, implement, and enforce appropriate architectural standards to meet business requirements
Experienced with developing reusable assets such as prototypes, POCs, and MVPs that contribute to organizational effectiveness and efficiency


Comprehensive knowledge of enterprise architecture frameworks, tools, and processes
Able to coach and mentor colleagues on architectural frameworks, patterns & best practices
Deep knowledge of service-oriented and event-driven architectures
Hands-on experience in cloud engineering and cloud-native design
Extensive understanding of DevOps best practices and introducing continuous automation into the application lifecycle (CI/CD pipeline)
Well-versed in API development and management
Experienced in container and container management
Experienced with industry standard programming languages, operating systems, application development frameworks, monitoring tools, and CI/CT/CD tools
Deep understanding of non-functional requirements and their importance to solution design
Skilled at aligning technology capabilities to business capabilities


Strategic Mindset – Seeing ahead to future possibilities and translating them into breakthrough strategies
Mentoring Talent – Developing engineers to grow their skill set and align to the organization’s goals
Cultivates Innovation – Creating new and better ways for the organization to be successful
Drives Results – Pushes team and cross functional partners to deliver needed results in tough circumstances and expedited timelines
Manages Complexity – Makes sense of complex and sometimes contradictory information to effectively solve problems
Manages Ambiguity – Operates effectively and drives work forward even when things are not certain or there is no clear way forward
Instills Trust – Quickly gains confidence and trust of others through honesty, integrity, and authenticity

If you will be working at home occasionally or permanently, the internet connection must be obtained through a cable broadband or fiber optic internet service provider with speeds of at least 10Mbps download/5Mbps upload.

For this position, we anticipate offering an annual salary of 147,300 - 245,500 USD / yearly, depending on relevant factors, including experience and geographic location.

This role is also anticipated to be eligible to participate in an annual bonus and long term incentive plan.

Starting on day one of your employment, you’ll be offered several health-related benefits including medical, vision, dental, and well-being and behavioral health programs. We also offer 401(k) with company match, company paid life insurance, tuition reimbursement, a minimum of 18 days of paid time off per year and paid holidays. Title: Data Scientist - Machine Learning Engineer
Job_Description:
Software Engineering Senior Manager

Role Summary:
As an Engineering Senior Manager, individual will lead your team to design, build, test and deliver large-scale global software applications, systems, platforms, services or technologies. As a key leader in the organization this individual will have the opportunity to work directly with partner IT and business teams, owning and driving major deliverables across all aspects of software delivery.

Responsibilities:
Knowledge of SDLC processes, including agile methodologies (Scrum & Kanban).

Manage direct reports including, performance and productivity. Mentor and coach staff with their professional development and define and enforce best practices. Proactively identify and develop training plans for knowledge gaps (technical or business-related) that limit team effectiveness.

Should have an automation first and continuous improvement mindset and drive the adoption of CI/CD tools and support the improvement of the toolsets/processes.

Actively participate in system design, interface design, validation of technology assumptions, and identification of options, within the framework of our Agile Release Train (ARTs).

Accountable for managing the major incidents assigned to Dental and Vision IT services and also familiar with handling Production incidents and alerts.

Actively participate in Production Support incident management, L2 and L3 support. Monitor and review incidents reported by business teams.

Ensure the efficient operation of the responsible teams through the clear articulation of operating mechanics, architecture health metrics and targets, incident and reporting throughput metrics and targets

Become a proactive trusted advisor to business leaders within Care and technology matrix partners.

Flexibility to adopt a continuous learning mindset and flex to cover a diverse set of technology needs

Boundless intellectual curiosity to continually explore how to do things better, bigger, faster and cheaper

A “roll-up your sleeves and get the job done” mentality

Technical and marketing skills to craft and execute your own programs and initiatives

Embrace a lean-agile mindset.

Operate with a continuous improvement mindset to improve the quality of Dental IT deliverables.

Continuously drive improvement and optimization through retrospectives, Inspect and Adopt and stakeholder feedback.


Ability to drive the conversion of legacy assets into modern architectures & infrastructures

Flexibility to adopt a continuous learning mindset and flex to cover a diverse set of technology needs

Solid managerial and/or mentorship experience

Boundless intellectual curiosity to continually explore how to do things better, bigger, faster and cheaper

A “roll-up your sleeves and get the job done” mentality

Team player and motivator

Technical and marketing skills to be able to craft and execute your own programs

Strong product management skills and ability to inspire software engineering teams

Qualifications

Bachelor's or Master's Degree in Computer Science, MIS, or other related field, or equivalent work experience

Experience designing, developing, and supporting technology decisions within various technologies including, JAVA, Oracle, PL/SQL, ETL Tools, RESTful/SOA services

Proficiency with Agile delivery and the SAFe framework, ideally in-tune with its leverage within a Fortune 500 IT environment


Influencing skills (achieving buy-in for delivery strategies across business and IT audiences)

Business acumen (able to effectively articulate business objectives and tie IT solutions to business outcomes)

Very strong analytical skills (technical options analysis, decision-making frameworks, business functional and technical analysis)

Quick learner (effective under pressure, able to efficiently impart knowledge to others)

Communication skills (ability to project clarity and precision in verbal and written communication; presentations before senior audiences)

Demonstrated comfort with core project management skills (project planning, scope management, issue and risk management, resource planning, financial management, etc.)

an ability to focus within multiple priorities, to be a strong team player within a group with multiple opinions, to be versatile in operating, resourceful in problem solving, flexible/adaptable to meet the needs of the situation

Title: Data Scientist - Machine Learning Engineer
Job_Description:
US Medical Integration Solutions: EDI
Application Development Advisor

Position Overview:
The job profile for this position is Application Development Advisor, which is a Band 4 Contributor Career Track Role.

The Application Development Advisor is a full stack engineer who designs, develops, and integrates solutions to solve business and technical requirements across EDI applications. Candidate must be passionate about technology, writing code and solving problems; able to work both independently and in close partnership with cross-functional teams and management; a motivated team member who enjoys learning and sharing knowledge.

Key Responsibilities:
Design, develop, and maintain high quality software

Write clean, secure, efficient, and modular code

Simplify and improve existing application code ensuring high unit test coverage

Identify potential problems and resolve application bottlenecks

Collaborate with Product Owners, Scrum Masters, and Software Engineers on Scrum/Kanban team as well as external teams to deliver value to our customers

Maintain knowledge of current and emerging technologies, industry trends and standards


5+ years of software development experience with a successful track record of production ready solutions

Edifecs v9.2.3, BizTalk 2020, SSIS, and related components

Working knowledge of X12N transactions, HL7 messages, and FHIR

Deep understanding of all things “transactional” – data schema design, profile and trading partner configuration, workflow design, data routing, etc.

Experience with database technologies such as MySQL, Teradata, RDS DB

Experience with continuous integration and source code control such as GitHub, UDeploy, and Jenkins.

Web Services, Java, SQL/SSIS development related to EDI

API Apps, API Management Portal

MS SQL & SSIS Servers 2016, 2019


Experience working with AWS services such as Lambda, S3, RDS DB, Kafka topic, Elastic search, Kubernetes pods

Experience with Scrum/Kanban/SAFe Agile Framework

Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science/Software Engineering or equivalent work experience

Title: Data Scientist - Machine Learning Engineer
Job_Description:
Excited to grow your career?

We value our talented employees, and whenever possible strive to help one of our associates grow professionally before recruiting new talent to our open positions. If you think the open position you see is right for you, we encourage you to apply!

Our people make all the difference in our success.

Job Summary

In this role, you will be responsible for resolving complex technical issues and ensuring that quality is maintained by following development patterns and standards. Preparing deployment and post-deployment plans to support the conversion and deployment of the solution. Interacting with architects, technical project managers, developers to certify that solutions meet requirements and customer needs. Improving coding quality and reliability by implementing good standards and processes (best practices). Increasing productivity by implementing tools and processes.

The individual will be expected to participate in the collaborative concept definition, software design and realization of products to support the strategic technology needs of the organization.

Focus for this team is on the delivery of innovative solutions to complex problems.

Provides expert content/professional leadership on complex Engineering assignments/projects.

Must be a current contractor with Cigna, Express Scripts, or Evernorth. Evernorth is a new business within the Cigna Corporation.

Bachelor’s Degree or Equivalent Experience

4-6 years of work experience in the IT field and a broad knowledge of technology.

Must have excellent oral, written and communication skills.

Customer centricity is a must to lead by example.

Demonstrated problem-solving skills and the ability to work collaboratively with other stakeholders or team member to resolve issues

Candidate should be able to lead cross functional Solutions

Ability to prioritize and handle multiple tasks.

Excellent Communications skills and should be able to effectively collaborate with the remote teams – both on-shore and off-shore

Title: Data Scientist - Machine Learning Engineer
Job_Description:
In this role, the applicant will get to implement software engineering solutions and best practices. The individual must have excellent analytical and technical skills. The ideal candidate should be comfortable working within a technical capacity across many sectors including core development on platform, data processing and report generation. Our team focuses on the delivery of innovative solutions to complex problems.

In this role, the applicant will get to implement software engineering solutions and best practices as part of a team focused on the delivery of innovative solutions to complex problems. The individual must have excellent analytical and technical skills. We’re looking for a person that has a breadth of knowledge in computer science, a problem solving mentality, comfortable working across many sectors including core development on a platform, data processing, report generation, and a desire to learn.

Key responsibilities:
The ideal candidate is a hands-on full stack developer.

You should have a broad range of development technologies in your background (such as Java, Python, SQL, APIs, GCP/AWS/Azure, etc.) and have the ability to champion existing technology stack in our platform.

Create Proof of concepts, innovate and integrate cloud-based software in a continuous delivery environment.

Partner with other developers and architects to design, document, develop, debug, and deployment of codebase while addressing security, cross-browser, and cross-platform concepts.

Actively Participate in technical committee meetings to reach architecture and framework decisions.

Pair programming with other developers as needed, and actively communicate with Product Managers and architects in a cross functional team.

Build and maintain a strong partnership with external stakeholders that interact with the company.

Troubleshoot production issues quickly and efficiently to ensure a productive workplace.

Understand and implement best practices for data protection and privacy.


5+ years of diverse Technology experience in Software development with Bachelor in Computer Science or equivalent trade or the equivalence of education and experience.

Hands on experience with Agile software development methodology and understands SAFe Agile framework and principles.

Strong Experience with both frontend and backend technologies such as Java, Python, React, Teradata, Hadoop, Oracle, SQL Server.

Hands on experience with event based architectures and real time messaging services such as Kafka, RabbitMQ, Kinesis and the likes.

AWS (preferred), Azure or GCP.

Experience with Tableau, Health Care and/or Pharmacy systems is a plus.

Excellent analytical skills, solid troubleshooting experience with excellent teamwork ability.

Should be organized and detail-oriented and a team player.

For this position, we anticipate offering an annual salary of $88,100 - $146,800, depending on relevant factors, including experience and geographic location.

This role is also anticipated to be eligible to participate in an annual bonus plan.

Title: Data Scientist - Machine Learning Engineer
Job_Description:
Remote, Work from home, United States

The new Data & Analytics Engineering group at Cigna is developing innovative technology to make healthcare simple, transparent, and more affordable. We are seeking highly talented and innovative cloud solution engineers to join us and help modernize the healthcare industry.

This team develops applications that provide Cigna with the analytics to optimize affordability for its members. Our tools analyze historical data to identify insights, forecast trends, and recommend actionable items to improve total medical costs. We are also advancing workflows with embedded insights that leverage machine learning techniques. You will have the opportunity to support the design, development, and deployment of new applications and features that will directly impact Cigna's bottom line, to ultimately provide better and more affordable healthcare. Our team uses a variety of technologies, from big data to the latest web frameworks. You will get to build state-of-the-art technology that is scalable and robust, utilizing cloud infrastructure, and full automation.

Ideal Candidates for this role will possess a high-level working knowledge and experience with the relevant stack (Python, SQL, Angular, AWS, DevOps (Jenkins, Ansible etc.)), preferably within an enterprise environment. Ideal candidates will be able to translate business needs and processes into solid technical requirements, speak to applicable patterns that will best achieve desired functionality, and be able to continuously deliver value and new features to our user base. They would demonstrate solid individual performance in a team environment, mentor less experienced developers, and participate in leadership strategy discussions that impact the health and roadmap of our web application suite. They should approach problems in a self-directed and inventive manner and engage in ego-less and productive retrospectives and discussions with a mentality of inclusiveness, respect, experimentation, and improvement.
RESPONSIBILITIES

Work with Operations business partners and Strategic Analytics colleagues to evaluate complex user-requests/projects.

Works to develop skills, self-motivated, provides feedback to others, and oversees resolution technical issues and complexities.

Ensure that all functionality is comprehensively tested in an automated way (regression, performance, compliance) before rollout to production.

Collaborate with Developers to deliver products aligned with recommended architectural/design patterns and identify and evaluate new patterns as they emerge.

Ensures defects are quickly assessed and/or mitigated and resolved, whether in non-production or production.

Help to solidify objectives and functional requirements for new or enhanced application capabilities.

Help to determine/estimate feasibility, cost and time required, compatibility with current system.

Prepare project documentation when needed and review code work for accuracy and functionality.

Mentor less experienced developers.

Participate in off-hours releases when necessary to ensure smooth deployments of new functionality, while working towards reducing the necessity of off-hours participation.
REQUIREMENTS

7+ years of work experience in programming / software development.

5+ years’ experience with Python.

5+ years of full stack including front-end app experience, with at least 1 of those years being with Angular and TypeScript.

Tableau or other data visualization framework experience is a plus.

Cypress or other testing automation framework experience is a plus.

Experience in deploy using CICD, run and manage applications in AWS is a plus.

Advanced proficiency creating and implementing API endpoints.

Experienced with writing efficient and optimized SQL queries and stored procedures.

Experienced in data schema best practices, preferably with applicable experience with PostgreSQL

Bachelor's Degree in Engineering or Computer Science preferred or the equivalent in education and experience

Thorough knowledge of programming concepts, design, procedures and practices.

Adaptability and willingness to learn, preferably a strong desire to learn.

Advanced problem-solving skills, and a proven history of solving complex problems.

Ability to work collaboratively with other departments to resolve complex issues with innovative solutions.

Demonstrated ability to prioritize workload and meet multiple project deadlines.

Ability to adapt in a dynamic work environment and make independent decisions.

Must be extremely detail-oriented, but able to keep a big-picture perspective, applying details at the appropriate point in an iterative project.

Strong customer service focus.

Excellent oral and written communication skills.

Familiarity with the Health Care Industry a plus.

Committed to delivering high-quality software solutions.

If you will be working at home occasionally or permanently, the internet connection must be obtained through a cable broadband or fiber optic internet service provider with speeds of at least 10Mbps download/5Mbps upload.

For this position, we anticipate offering an annual salary of 115,100 - 191,800 USD / yearly, depending on relevant factors, including experience and geographic location.

This role is also anticipated to be eligible to participate in an annual bonus plan.

Title: Data Scientist - Machine Learning Engineer
Job_Description:
Summary:
eviCore Software Engineers build and advance technologies and products leveraged across the organization and healthcare. eviCore is shaping the future of Utilization Management through our advanced platform. We are looking for engineers enthusiastic about solving problems across the full-stack as we continue to push innovation. We are looking for engineers to be versatile, display a passion for leadership and challenge the status quo.
In this role you will deliver solutions that align to the end user as a member of a highly autonomous Scrum Team. You will help create solutions and deliver backlog items in support of a multi-data center, active-active, event driven platform that is backed by Kafka. Your contributions will include design and delivery of cloud deployable Microservice solutions, as well as platform components and packages for use by other development teams.

Primary Responsibilities:
Build modern, architecturally sound components, tools and applications.

Bring Engineering discipline to design and problem solve

Evangelize best practices

End-User Focus.

Collaborate with peers to deliver quality technology.


Bachelors in Computer Science or related field, or equivalent relevant work experience and technical knowledge.

6-10+ years Software Development Experience in Microsoft Stack

6-10+ years background in software development in C# and one or more other programming languages.

Experience in Microservice Architecture

Azure DevOps, GitHub, Jenkins, TFS

Exposure to SOLID, Architectural Patterns, Development Best Practices

Unit Testing, Test Driven Development and use of mocking frameworks.

Git Repository, TFS Version Control or other source controls.

React, MVC, Angularjs, Angular 5+

Security Engineering or Knowledge of OWASP Principles a plus

Kafka knowledge a plus

NoSQL Solutions a plus

Experience building in Event Driven Architecture a plus

Title: Data Scientist - Machine Learning Engineer
Job_Description:
Cigna CRM seeks a Senior Application Developer with expertise in Cloud to join our development team. Helping our customers achieve healthier, more secure lives is at the heart of what we do. Core capabilities of CRM include marketing campaigns, improving customer engagement, driving customers towards next based action derived based on analytics on customer data and interactions with Cigna and continuous engagement with customer to improve customer health, provide best in class customer experience on the all customer facing channels, driving customer to gain the full benefits of the plan and reduce cost.

The ideal candidate is a motivated, self-starter that brings a fresh perspective and passion to solve complex business and technical challenges in a fast-paced and team-oriented environment. The position requires hands-on development of event driven scalable applications. Our team is extremely collaborative. Interested candidates must love to write code, willing to learn, and willing to share new ideas to improve our team and processes.


Learn Overall System Architecture and supports long-range strategic direction of systems

Supports and provides input into architecture, design and development for multiple critical applications

Implement software engineering solutions for diverse and complex business requirements including packaged application customization and multi-systems integration

Analyze customer business requirements which requires end to end business knowledge on Healthcare, Technology skills and well versed in agile methodologies

Design and recommend appropriate solutions to implement and/or upgrade applications. Interact with business and development team on a regular basis to resolve issues or provide clarifications on architecture and/or design documents

Responsible for all facets of the development, maintenance, and support of applications with strong emphasis on the analysis of the business requirements and written communication of technical design

Support production implementation activities. Perform advanced troubleshooting and debugging of application programs using Full-stack software developer tools in support of business and customers


3+ years' experience being past of Agile teams and working in Agile methodology working Scrum or Kanban

7+ years of experience in IT delivery

3+ years of Cloud experience (AWS preferred)

Python, Java, Spark (at least one of them)

3+ years of database –Dynamo DB, MS SQL Server or Teradata (at least one of them)

Development experience of RESTful/API services, microservices


Bachelor's degree in Software Engineering, Computer Science or related field, or equivalent work experience.

Experience developing in an CI/CD environment (Jenkins/Ansible experience a plus)

Experience in Scripting (AngularJS, JavaScript) is a plus

Experience in Databricks is a plus

Experience in Teradata Vantage is a plus

Experience with the utilization of GIT version control software

Excellent troubleshooting & strong communication skills

Knowledge and/or experience with Health care information domains is a plus

Title: Data Scientist - Machine Learning Engineer
Job_Description:
Remote, Work from home, United States

Cigna is a leading health services company, with a global presence and 95+ million customers. The new Data & Analytics (DNA) group at Cigna is developing innovative technology to make healthcare simple, transparent, and more affordable. We are seeking full stack software / data engineers to join us and help modernize the healthcare industry.

Contribute as a Senior Software Engineer to a dynamic team developing a web application that identifies and tracks critical opportunities for market managers and contract negotiators at Cigna. The application provides end-users a pipeline of cost-saving opportunities and enables them to discuss/research them, review suggested actions on them and ultimately report savings generated. The Opportunity Detection application lives at the intersection of software engineering, data science and health insurance business operations.

KEY CHARACTERISTICS

A focus on DevOps and CICD pattern engineering

You will develop full stack applications that are scalable, robust, and thoughtfully designed. You are comfortable with all layers of the stack, from the database to the front-end.

You will be involved in the full software development lifecycle, from design to implementation.

You build components in modular, reusable fashion that makes it easy to re-use.

You will mentor junior developers and support their learning experience

You will ship production code to a large customer base, and will take full ownership of your work, including testing and deployments.

You will collaborate with other software engineers, domain experts, and end-users, to build the right solutions that address our business needs. You know how to navigate an organization to find the people and answers you need.

You know how to make engineering trade-offs and how to communicate them to others. You can prioritize many competing tasks on an aggressive timeline.

You are passionate about learning – about healthcare as well as technology.

You are entrepreneurial, business-minded, and are willing to take risks and advocate new ideas

REQUIREMENTS

2+ years being part of Agile teams – Scrum or Kanban

Typescript, Python, Java, C++, Go, etc.

Infrastructure as code experience - Terraform/Cloudformation/Jenkins

Cloud experience - AWS preferred

RDBMS knowledge (MySQL, PostgreSQL, etc.) and experience working with large data sets

Excellent troubleshooting skills

Bachelor's Degree in Engineering or Computer Science preferred or the equivalent in education and experience

BONUS POINTS FOR ANY OF THE FOLLOWING

Prior healthcare experience

Title: Data Scientist - Machine Learning Engineer
Job_Description:
Responsibilities:
Simply put, we focus on delivering business led, technology enabled change for our clients including industry specific enterprise resource planning and the latest in mobile, analytics and cloud solutions
In joining our technology team, you'll work with our Business Partners and Business Analysts to transform their organization's architecture and technical landscape by leveraging SAP and leading cloud technologies to support core transaction processing and reporting competencies ultimately strengthening their ability to support management decision making and corporate strategy
As a Senior Manager, you'll work as part of a team of problem solvers, helping to solve complex business issues from strategy to execution. This will include SDLC and Project Management strategy like waterfall, Kanban/Agile and Change Management
Encourage everyone to have a voice and invite opinion from all, including quieter members of the team
Deal effectively with ambiguous and unstructured problems and situations
Initiate open and candid coaching conversations at all levels
Move easily between big picture thinking and managing relevant detail
Anticipate stakeholder needs, and develop and discuss potential solutions, even before the stakeholder realizes they are required
Contribute technical knowledge in area of specialism
Contribute to an environment where people and technology thrive together to accomplish more than they could apart
Navigate the complexities of cross-border and/or diverse teams and engagements
Initiate and lead open conversations with teams, clients and stakeholders to build trust


Demonstrates intimate-level abilities and/or a proven record of success managing efforts with identifying and addressing client needs:
Demonstrates expert-level abilities in the SAP Business Technology Platform, Cloud Foundry, Mobile Development and Hybris Platforms
Demonstrates intimate-level abilities and a proven record of success with SAP HANA Technical Concept and Architecture, SAP Cloud Platform for Extensions, Data Modeling using HANA Studio, ABAP Development Tools (ADT), Code Performance Rules and Guidelines for SAP HANA, ADBC, Native SQL, ABAP Core data Services and OData Services;
Demonstrates an extensive-level of ability with ABAP interface development protocols such as RFC, BAPI, IDOC, ABAP Proxy and knowledge on Restful ABAP programming models;
Demonstrates intimate-level abilities and a proven record of success in Custom Code Migration and Adaptation process in SAP S/4HANA (knowledge on S/4 HANA Readiness checks and usage of migration tools);
Demonstrates intimate-level abilities and a proven record of success in leading development teams in development activities, connectivity activities across multiple SAP platforms (S/4, SAC, CPI, CIG) and Technology guidelines;
Demonstrates intimate-level abilities and a proven record of success abilities and as a team leader, leading mid-large sized teams: creating a positive environment by monitoring workloads of the team while meeting client expectations and respecting the work-life quality of team members; providing candid, meaningful feedback in a timely manner; and keeping leadership informed of progress and issues;
Demonstrates clear understanding of the SDLC lifecycle and SAP Solution Manger for application lifecycle management
Demonstrates intimate-level abilities and a proven record of success with managing the reinvesting in SAP Tech Practice development efforts by building eminence around SAP Solutions and Offerings;
Demonstrates intimate-level abilities and a proven record of success with mentoring junior staff members;
Demonstrates intimate-level abilities to reinvest development solutions and offering with SAP competency


8+ years professional work experience in technology industry
Multiple SAP Implementations
Managed development in life Sciences and/or Distribution
Bachelor Degree or equivalent in Computers, Information Technology, or related field
Good understanding of ASAP/Activate methodology

Title: Data Scientist - Machine Learning Engineer
Job_Description:
A Platform Engineer (Cloud Engineering Senior Advisor) will support the establishment of the Destination State Architecture that is comprised of several Platform Services: Application Management, Developer Experience, Data and Identity Management. The key goal of the Destination State Architecture is to provide a high-quality low-friction experience for delivery teams within the enterprise. Additionally, the Digital Platform Engineer must participate and/or lead technical communities and continually push for thoughtful evolution of technology and/or software engineering best practices. Lastly, the individual is expected to collaborate with peers across the organization to contribute to the technical direction and/or strategy.

Key Job Responsibilities
Collaborate with experienced cross-disciplinary engineers to help standardize the adoption of Destination State patterns and practices to enable and empower teams to develop and operate solutions that embrace experimentation, scale participation, simplify complexity and increase speed to market
Build, maintain and continuously improve the platforms and services including infrastructure, automation, platform integrations and CI/CD tooling used by engineers, operations, and applications making it easier to develop, build, deploy and operate software across the enterprise.
Design and build innovative tools and services in a large distributed environment and help lead changes across the company.
Design and code the right solutions starting with broadly defined problems
Work in an agile environment and deliver high quality software

Qualifications
AWS Cloud skills highly desired
Kubernetes skills highly desired
Experience in using development languages such as Python, Java, Go, Shell or other languages to build reusable tools
Experience with GitOps
Experience automating software deployments and following a continuous delivery and deployment (CI/CD) model
Deep knowledge in adjacent areas of engineering to influence peer group
Able to lead and contribute expertise to activities associated with defining engineering requirements, determining technical feasibility, forecasting (time, cost, complexity), and best practices to avoid pitfalls and mistakes
Able to drive deployment design in support of logical solution architecture
Able to conceptualize solution ideas
Able to lead development of design patterns
Able to play a tech lead role for major engineering initiatives
Able to rationalize technical recommendation for directional decisions
Ability to speak in non-technical terms and explain technical concepts in crisp, clear, and plain terms
Proven ability to design systems integration approaches, new software applications, interfaces, and services as well as enhancements to existing components comprising an overall IT solution. Broad, applied experience with common computing platforms, legacy and modern development tools and languages, database management systems, and enterprise application integration (middleware) technologies
Results-oriented and diligent with a sense of urgency
Assertive and self-directed
Ability to navigate a highly-matrixed organization effectively.

Title: Data Scientist - Machine Learning Engineer
Job_Description:
We're looking for an experienced Software Engineering Senior Manager within the Cigna Supplemental Benefits (CSB) group to lead and build a team of highly-skilled full stack engineers. In this role we expect you to possess a passion for growing and developing highly technical teams in a geographically distributed, agile organization. If you are passionate about strategic planning, seamless execution, and building a high-performing team then we need you!

Some example responsibilities include:
Develop and execute upon a technology roadmap in alignment with our operating plan and the vision for organization.
Hire, manage, coach, and develop a team of full stack engineers with great technical skills, characteristics, and team fit.
Rolling up your sleeves and getting into the low-level details with the team when needed.
Define and iterate upon team processes to improve scale and reduce errors.
Build partnerships with key members within and outside of the CSB organization.


Proven success as a technical leader, coaching and managing large teams (minimum six years of experience) across more than one office.
A solid foundation in technology, software development, and system administration allowing you to challenge the team, suggest technical alternatives, and recognize excellence.
Strong communication skills with the ability to explain technical concepts to business audiences, and to explain business processes, concepts, challenges, and issues to technical resources.
Problem solving aptitude with strong intellectual curiosity.

Qualifications
Deep hands-on technical expertise in cloud based distributed software design and development.
Experience designing software architectures for scalability, reliability and performance.
Knowledge of professional software engineering practices & best practices, including coding standards, code reviews, source control management, build processes, testing, and operations.
Experience with back-end distributed systems.
A passion for people management and mentorship.
Experience with the SCRUM methodology for agile software development.
Prior experience as a software engineer or software development manager.
9+ years of software development experience including design patterns, data structures, test driven development utilizing Java, .NET, and full stack JavaScript.

You'll work together with product managers, product owners, analysts, software engineers, and subject matter experts to deliver impactful outcomes to the organization. You'll participate in multiple concurrent high-visibility projects and support occasional ad hoc needs from your internal customers.

You will help drive the major programs of work throughout the team. You'll bring order and focus while leaving room for flexibility and innovation. You'll promote infectious urgency around you, you'll be a mentor, multiplier, influencer, negotiator, and awesome communicator rolled into one.

More about you
You value high-quality work with attention to detail and have a track record of delivering both. You combine curiosity, judgment, and drive, and like asking "why" to unravel a seemingly complex problem and get to the root cause. You engender a collaborative environment where teams work together to solve problems with a positive outlook.
When you encounter a problem you come up with multiple solutions, weigh the tradeoffs and efforts, identify the best path forward, and exercise good judgment to drive ahead. You have experience in change management and turning information and questions into action. You're comfortable interacting with people across all levels of an organization and can field questions during a presentation like a pro.
You can quickly learn and be impactful in new areas to keep pace with our rapid growth and evolution. You can take an ambiguous assignment and deliver value quickly. You employ multiple tools, methods, and techniques to get things done.

If you will be working at home occasionally or permanently, the internet connection must be obtained through a cable broadband or fiber optic internet service provider with speeds of at least 10Mbps download/5Mbps upload.

Title: Data Scientist - Machine Learning Engineer
Job_Description:
Remote, Work from home, United States

Are you looking for an exceptional career opportunity in data analytics? Do you enjoy learning new technology in a fast paced environment? Are you ready to support a team that distributes essential data/reporting to business partners and leaders? This opportunity focuses heavily on data manipulation, trend analysis, reverse engineering issues within data, and using tools to publish quality data and reporting to drive real time business decisions. The position also gives you the opportunity to use critical thinking skills to solve problems and improve business and IT processes. Our mission is to move forward in the methodology of site reliability engineering (SRE) which is a set of principles and practices that incorporates resiliency software engineering via automation.

Role Summary
This position is aligned to the Analytic Data Business Support team within the Data & Analytics Engineering Organization.

Responsibilities include researching and triaging issues and requests for US Commercial data sourced from various databases and warehouses.

Work as a team member to review issues impacting the supported data platforms and warehouses.

Review service and project requests to appropriately identify the business impact and priority.

Route work requests to appropriate fulfillment channels.

Operate as an individual contributor responsible for servicing multiple applications owned and maintained by DAE Enterprise Reporting.

Act as a liaison for IT Production Support and Delivery for activities such as root cause analysis, issue resolution and prioritization of system enhancements.

Communicate release and issue information to applicable users.

Identify and take ownership of issues with the ability to engage appropriate partners in order to drive to resolution.

Enforce Service Level Agreements (SLA’s) through effective partnering with upstream data sources to ensure timely and accurate reporting for internal users and customer delivery.

Enable type Site Reliability Engineering (SRE) by working with stakeholders to identify & define the service level indicators (SLI) and objectives (SLO)

Work closely with engineering teams on monitoring and performance management tools initiatives to improve system reliability and performance.

Skills and Responsibilities

Must be comfortable working with senior management, both on the business and technical sides. And in doing so, demonstrate the ability to create professional relationships and effectively partner with and influence a cross-functional team.

Will need to have the ability to understand technology, work closely with IT partners, and successfully communicate technology concepts to business owners or other persons who are not technically-oriented

Embrace an environment of change even if the change is radical and helps others to accept new ideas.

Strong analytical, synthesizing, and problem solving skills with emphasis on utilizing business processes, technology, and data to solve business problems. Demonstrated ability to work at both conceptual and detailed levels. Creative thinker with ability to think outside the box and translate strategies into actions with an attention to detail.

Ability to coordinate with diverse matrix groups and provide outstanding customer service. Team player with proven ability to foster and manage working relationships within a virtual and matrix environment. Support development of recommendations which are cost effective and productive.

Excellent interpersonal, consulting, and relationship management skills. Superior written and verbal communication skills to clearly document and communicate data needs and methodologies.

Communicate findings/gaps/solutions via written summary / presentation, as well as verbally.

Facilitate conversation to validate working hypotheses / recommended solutions.

Manage the synthesis of complicated concepts into easy to understand, meaningful information.

Exposure to standard software development practices including agile, deployment pipelines, continuous integrations and continuous delivery

Understanding of software skills such as business analysis, development, maintenance and software improvements


Hands on experience with strong database querying skills utilizing SQL Server, TOAD, HUE, SAS (EG) or Teradata required.

Python and/or PySpark experience is required

Hands on experiences in some AWS technologies like – Cloud Watch, Step Functions, Lambda, Glue, EC2, Redshift, DynamoDB, SQS, ECS/EKS, Elastic Search, SnowFlake, Elastic Cache, databricks, TeraForm to name a few.

Exposure to standard software development practices including agile, deployment pipelines, continuous integrations and continuous delivery

Experience working in HDFS, Apache Spark or Big Data platforms is a plus

Experience working with monitory applications - Dynatrace, Splunk etc. is a plus

Any experience with build and deployment pipeline technologies like Jenkins, Cloudbees, Terraform, Urban Code Deploy, Ansible, GitHub is a plus

Knowledge of Data Management and Data Quality, a plus

Experience in related healthcare analytics, a plus

Job_Description:
Software Engineering Senior Manager
Are you looking for an opportunity to engineer modern Cloud application, Continuous Deployment/Continuous Integration, and infrastructure solutions across a breadth of platforms and technologies and foster a community while being supported with plentiful training and mentorship opportunities?

We’re looking for a Cloud Engineering Manager who will be responsible for enriching a Cloud Practice within Core Systems Platform (CSP) to accelerate us on Cloud journey through building foundational capabilities/patterns and enabling teams as well as managing the distributed applications from a design, technical architecture and selecting cloud services wisely.

Core Responsibilities – Core Systems Platform Cloud Engineering
As a manager, evangelize a Cloud Engineering culture and community within CSP
As a manager, enable Cloud Engineering teams and guild/practice across CSP
Develop existing engineering talent for modern Cloud and DevSecOps practices/solutions
Engineer foundational modern Cloud capabilities and empower/enable teams to utilize
Develop a CSP Cloud roadmap and track progress against roadmap
Coach CSP scrum teams, empowering them on their Cloud and DevSecOps journey

Core Responsibilities – Distributed applications on the Cloud
Lead the Distributed applications and its teams
Lead architecture/design
Lead the Distributed applications data management, and migration engineering/operations
Lead the Distributed applications (real time and batch) performance, volume, and scalability from engineering, testing, and maintenance perspective

Ideal Candidate Will Offer
Positive, growth-oriented mindset
Hands-on, collaborative, partnering and engineering lead mindset
Robust technical acumen on cloud/on-prem DevSecOps software development and technologies
Passion for building modular, configurable Cloud and DevSecOps solutions utilizing the latest technologies
Empathetic technical leadership and talent development
Boundless intellectual curiosity to continually explore how to move better, faster and cheaper
Collaborative voice for solution integrity utilizing best practices and industry standards
Technical and marketing skills to craft and execute initiatives
Robust product management skills and inspiration for DevSecOps/software engineering teams

Experience/Qualifications
Hands on experience engineering/developing modern on-prem/public cloud DevSecOps solutions, Angular, Node Js, Python and Go
Expert level experience in relational and NOSQL databases.
Willing to learn, go above and beyond attitudes.
Experience with modern and legacy development languages
Experience with modern and legacy database solutions
Strong healthcare domain data experience.
Experience with CI/CD tooling and Agile.

Title: Data Scientist - Machine Learning Engineer
Job_Description:
United States - Work From Home

JOB DESCRIPTION:
The Mobile Development Sr. Manager, Software Engineer, supports a team of Software Development Engineers. This position participates in the evaluation and prioritization of customer and user requests. Managing team activities, providing functional guidance and completing individual tasks as needed. Ensures the team follows Agile best practices as defined by Express Scripts. Participates in cross-departmental Technology initiatives. The Technology Manager has accountability for the work of all members of the team, and represents, strategizes, and promotes methodologies and processes and devises improvements to the current processes. The Sr. Manager is also responsible for providing timely feedback to their team members and assisting their leadership with year-end calibration and identification of high performers.

The Sr. manager is responsible in leading the mobile development team as a people leader, and scrum master, in the day-to-day activities that will serve the mobile teams. The sr. manager will support various team activities for the mobile client teams, participating story grooming sessions, assisting TPO with backlogs and project reviews. This may include sprint planning, sprint demos and retrospectives that assists the team to a continuous improvement culture. The sr. manager must possess high competence in communication, negotiation, listening, mitigate conflict, build alliances and achieve desired results using strong interpersonal and diplomacy skills.


Provides direction and manages mid-level professional employees, high-level non-exempts, and/or supervisors; may manage technical/business support or production/operation staff; Is accountable for the performance and results of a team within own discipline or function; Adapts departmental plans and priorities to address resources and operational changes; Work is reviewed upon completion for adequacy in meeting objectives.
Ability to lead high talent teams in local and remote locations; Previous supervisory experience in leading a technical team or managing a larger cross-functional team of non-direct reports; Ability to motivate employees, handle difficult employee relations issues and create a culture that supports high employee morale; Conceptual knowledge of IT concepts, procedures and practices; Advanced problem solving skills and the ability to work collaboratively with other departments to resolve complex issues with innovative solutions; Demonstrated ability to prioritize work load and meet project deadlines; Ability to adapt in a dynamic work environment and make independent decisions; Extremely detail oriented; Strong customer service focus; Excellent oral and written communication skills; Willingness to work a flexible schedule to accommodate project deadlines


Works to develop employee’s skills, evaluates performance, provides regular feedback, supports employee career path growth, and oversees resolution of employee relations issues.

Works with the architect and stake holders/partners to develop solutions in support of mobile development

Proactively manages cross-team relationships and expectations

Facilitates timely and routine communication in both directions between mobile teams and the upstream dependent teams.

Partners with TPO/architect to help prioritize backlogs based on business needs/compliance/client commitments/technology debts

Scales solutions to the client’s goals and budget

Serves as escalation point for the team’s critical issues

Communicates team status

Support activities in project initiation during conceptual stages through funding approval

Coordinates with cross project teams in planning & execution, resolves challenges around projects, priorities, & releases

Coordinates with cross-teams for necessary resources

Knows and understands key performance indicators for the team’s success

Participates in usual people leader duties that include regular 1X1s, career development, performance management, and meeting financial targets

Assists with the Budget planning and management for their department


Bachelor’s degree in related field and 8+ years relevant experience

Experienced with mobile development

Knowledge in mobile client standards and techniques for mobile applications

Understand mobile-specific performance & issues

Experience leading a team of mobile developers

Strong & proven analytical skills and knowledgeable in mobile tools (Splunk, Adobe Analytics is a plus)

Experienced with app store and in-app feedback

Scrum Master experience with various agile methodologies (Scrum, Kanban, etc.)

Excellent verbal and written communication and presentations skills

Experience working with cross teams and partners

Proven ability to meet deadlines and balance multiple deadlines

Job_Description:

The Facets Software Engineering Senior Advisor will provide counsel, and advice to top management on significant Application Development matters, often requiring coordination between organizations and acts as the principal designer for complex major systems and their subsystems utilizing a thorough understanding of available technology, tools and existing designs.

Key Responsibilities
Provides comprehensive consultation to business unit and IT management and staff at the highest technical level on all phases of application programming and processes for diverse development platforms, computing environments (e.g., host based, distributed systems, client server, software, hardware, technologies and tools, etc.).

Please note - to apply for this role, you must be a current contractor with Cigna, Express Scripts, or Evernorth. Evernorth is a new business within the Cigna Corporation.

Title: Data Scientist - Machine Learning Engineer
Job_Description:
The Pricing and Underwriting team is looking for a seasoned full stack developer to meet a need within our Corporate Systems department. Our combined team is about 40+ developers, across 5 application teams and 2 domains (Pricing, Rebates). You will be working in the Pricing area and will wear both developer hat - to learn and eventually guide other developers on the team - as well as systems analyst hat - to work closely with our product owners and business analysts. We have a lot of work requests from the business and need more people who can work to take business requirements and translate them into functional JIRA user stories. So you will need to wear 2 hats - senior developer and senior analyst and will be supported by a team of skilled developers and engaged product owners. The project is a critical project and has meaningful impact to the bottom line of the business.

Roles and Responsibilities:
Ability to write user interface software in Javascript using React

Title: Data Scientist - Machine Learning Engineer
Job_Description:
Remote, Work from home, United States (EST hours)

Come, grow your career with us.

Join a team whose mission is to move forward in the methodology of site reliability engineering (SRE). SRE is a set of principles and practices that incorporates resiliency software engineering via automation. Enjoy creating and modify existing applications to provide early warning awareness of potential problems, which eliminate toil, and measure real service level objectives (SLO) using service level indicators (SLI)/service level agreements. Be a part of a team that drives a culture of continuous improvement, continuous development. Enjoy the benefits of supporting systems that are efficient and improve customer satisfaction. We are looking for candidates with delivery experience. Be a part of Cigna’s future.

The role requires a wide variety of strengths and capabilities, including

Bachelor’s degree or equivalent experience

3+ years of experience in Developer, Operations roles

Knowledge of application, data and infrastructure architecture disciplines

Working proficiency in development and monitoring tools

Ability to work in large, collaborative teams to achieve organization goals

A mindset focused on reliability, uptime and the customer experience

SRE experiences a plus

Willing to work on a distributed team spanning multiple time zones.

Analytical and problem-solving skills

Good communication skills

The desire to continually learn and test your own boundaries

Exposure to standard software development practices including agile, deployment pipelines, continuous integrations and continuous delivery

Understanding of software skills such as business analysis, development, maintenance and software improvements


2+ years of Python experience, required.

2+ years of hands on experiences in some AWS technologies like – Cloud Watch, Step Functions, Lambda, Glue, EC2, Redshift, DynamoDB, SQS, ECS/EKS, Elastic Search, SnowFlake, Elastic Cache, databricks, TeraForm to name a few.

Experience with monitoring and observability systems like Dynatrace, CA APM, Splunk, a plus.

Experience with build and deployment pipeline technologies like Jenkins, Terraform, Ansible, GitHub, a plus.

Experience in Pyspark, a plus.

The primary responsibilities include

Operational analysis

Manage and monitor production systems

Application Availability & performance issues

Data and Integration issues

Stakeholder communication

Incident Management and root cause analysis

Facilitate the incident management

Guide the team on root cause analysis

Manage performance metrics

Work with stakeholders to identify & define the service level indicators and objectives

Measure and report the performance metrics.

Automation and tools

Work with the service delivery teams in developing and testing automation of repetitive and manual efforts.

Work closely with engineering teams on monitoring and performance management tools initiatives to improve system reliability and performance.

Team building

Help teams transition to SRE mind set

Help with SRE adoption across teams

If you will be working at home occasionally or permanently, the internet connection must be obtained through a cable broadband or fiber optic internet service provider with speeds of at least 10Mbps download/5Mbps upload.

Title: Data Scientist - Machine Learning Engineer
Job_Description:
The Technology Sr. Manager – Software Development Engineering manages a team of Software Engineers. This position participates in the evaluation and prioritization of customer/user requests. Assigns initiatives, research and work assignments to team members and directs activities, providing technical, functional guidance and completing individual tasks as needed. Ensures the team follows Agile best practices as defined by Cigna. Participates in cross-departmental Technology initiatives. The Technology Manager has accountability for the work of all members of the team, and also represents, strategizes and promotes methodologies and processes and devises improvements to the current processes. This person is also responsible for providing timely feedback to their team members and assisting their leadership with year-end compensation planning and identification of high performers.

ESSENTIAL FUNCTIONS

Manages sprint teams located across one or more locations, including WFH staff
Works to develop employee’s skills, evaluates performance, provides regular feedback, supports employee career path growth, and oversees resolution of employee relations issues
Consults regularly with TPO and other Technology management to evaluate user requests and clarify objectives for projects and initiatives
Has first level accountability for aspects of the Pharmacy API Services (PAS) API suite, including accountability for services, gateway and data sync support of multiple front-end channels and external clients
Acts as the primary contact point for day-to-day issues impacting the Product(s) they are responsible for
Drives and builds productive, collaborative relationships with Technology, Infrastructure and Operations partners
Develops annual initiatives, goals and specific deliverables for their team. Oversees determination of feasibility, cost and time required, compatibility with current policies, procedures, and functions
Completes initiatives as assigned, coordinating their team resources and resources in different departments.
Provides assistance to Technology team members needing their expertise and knowledge.
May be asked to code and/or review code in support of certain initiatives
Provides on-the-job training for new or less experienced team members.
Mentors team members to improve their understanding and skill, and ensure they are familiar with resource materials
Works with Technology Management team to analyze operations and efficiency of the Technology group and recommend process improvements.
Works with departmental leadership to develop and implement strategic business work plan goals
Functions as a first point of escalation to mitigate issues and concerns with their team and/or codebase
Tracks and periodically reports progress to more senior management
Assists with the Budget planning and management for their department
Participates in special initiatives or task forces as assigned

QUALIFICATIONS

Bachelor’s Degree in related field and 10 years relevant experience, or Master’s Degree and 7 years relevant experience, or 14 years of equivalent experience
Experience with APIs, microservices, external gateways, distributed architecture and backend DB’s is a strong plus
Any prior experience managing development teams working on APIs is a plus
Technical knowledge or development experience in Java, Spring framework, PL/SQL or REST services is a strong plus
Experience performing code reviews, and coordinating peer code reviews, is a plus
Professional and/or management experience within the Healthcare space is a plus
Ability to lead high talent teams in local and remote/offshore locations
Ability to motivate employees, handle difficult employee relations issues and create a culture that supports high employee morale
Must have a passion for management and leadership
Must have conceptual knowledge of Technology API concepts, procedures and practices
Must have experience in agile methodology, and it’s application via scrum or kanban techniques
Experience of the Atlassian toolkit, along with GitHub & automated testing tools such as Cucumber & Jasmine, is a plus
Advanced problem solving skills and the ability to work collaboratively with other departments to resolve complex issues with innovative solutions
Experience interfacing with nearshore/offshore vendor teams is a strong plus
Demonstrated ability to prioritize work-load, run multiple initiatives concurrently, and meet project deadlines
Ability to adapt in a dynamic work environment and make independent decisions
Extremely detail oriented
Strong customer service focus
Excellent oral and written communication skills
Willingness to work a flexible schedule, including OOH/weekend work if needed, to accommodate initiative deadlines

If you will be working at home occasionally or permanently, the internet connection must be obtained through a cable broadband or fiber optic internet service provider with speeds of at least 10Mbps download/5Mbps upload.

This role is subject to the CMS (Centers for Medicare/Medicaid Services) COVID-19 vaccine mandate. Full vaccination is required, meaning that workers in this position must have received one dose of the Johnson & Johnson vaccine or two doses of an mRNA vaccine before the first day of work.

For this position, we anticipate offering an annual salary of 126,400 - 210,600 USD / yearly, depending on relevant factors, including experience and geographic location.

This role is also anticipated to be eligible to participate in an annual bonus plan.

Title: Data Scientist - Machine Learning Engineer
Job_Description:
Job Profile Summary:
The Dataload Engineer will be responsible for the overall Enterprise Client Data Exchange/Load environment.

This is a critical role as all of the data received by clients are loaded to the core business applications and are vital to the patient authorization and case build process.

Required to be working on-call as well as occasionally on weekend as needed.

Technical Experience:
6+ years of experience with Data Exchange/Load, Data Warehouse and TSQL development (scripting, stored procedures, triggers, query development)

Azure Blob Storage, Azure Databricks, Azure Data Factory, Scala programming experience and/or AWS cloud environment experience required

Strong understanding of Database technology (SQL Server, Azure SQL and Hive)

Hands-on experience with ETL, SSIS, SSRS, SSAS, BCP etc.

Knowledge of EDI (IBM Sterling B2B Integrator , IBM ITXA) with understanding of 834, 837, XML, X12 file formats

Knowledge and Experience applying best practices and standards for TSQL and SDLC

Development Tools/Applications (SSMS, FileZilla, Move IT, GitHub, Visual Studio etc.)

SFTP File Management including PGP encryption\decryption

Experience with Workflow Management and Process Automation


Reporting Data Analysis/Reporting Skills (On Demand, Error, Trending, Summary, etc)

Agile Methodologies/SCRUM

Familiar with ANSI/EDI standards

Documentation Development

Excellent Interpersonal and Communications Skills

Critical Thinking/Problem Solving

Innovative/Out of Box Thinking

Ownership and Responsibility

Proactive

Ticket Management


Automation using PowerShell

Reporting experience using Power BI, Tableau , SSRS are plus

Healthcare/Medical/insurance data experience a plus

Title: Data Scientist - Machine Learning Engineer
Job_Description:
Engineer will work with a team of talented individuals and will be responsible for design, development and testing of applications and components that integrate with complex enterprise systems and with external vendors. Individual is expected to have extensive experience working with distributed applications and be passionate about solving complex data integration problems using best technologies available.

Engineer should be highly motivated, a self-starter and a well-rounded team player who works best in a collaborative and agile environment. Excellent written and oral communication skills are essential as an individual in this role will actively work with remote scrum teams, business owners, enterprise architects, security and infrastructure teams.

Responsibilities

Leverage existing open source frameworks, third party components/libraries, cloud and commercial software to design and develop robust enterprise solutions.

Utilize existing capabilities and be inclined to reuse existing proven technologies vs building from scratch or reinventing the wheel.

Enable a 360-degree view of customer-centric information through integration of a multitude of internal/external systems, mobile apps, devices, and data marts.

Ability to implement test driven development with strong focus on automated testing.

Support and enhance existing Cigna Supplemental Benefits applications used by consumers, brokers and operations staff.

Participate in all agile ceremonies effectively.

Ability to lead team of mid-level developers.

Skillset

Engineer should be very familiar with advanced concepts and have relevant, hands-on experience in many of the following areas to be a successful contributor to the team:

Java, J2EE and related frameworks such as Spring and Spring Boot, ORM technologies etc.

Microservices Architecture and Rest patterns using leading industry recommended security frameworks.

Cloud and related technologies such as AWS, Google, Azure.

UI development experience using Angular/Typescript/Javascript technologies.

Exposure to python, Node.js and other similar scripting languages

Test Automation Skills using Behavioral Driven Development.

Data Integration (batch, real-time) following Enterprise Integration Patterns.

Service Oriented Architecture (event-driven SOA, Web Services, REST, ESB).

Message driven architecture (JMS, SOA, Spring).

Relational Database, No SQL Database and Data Modelling,

Database development & tuning (PL/SQL/XQuery).

Performance (threading, indexing, clustering, caching).

Document-centric data architecture (XML DB/NoSQL).

Knowledge of reporting/BI tools such as Tableau would be plus.

Knowledge of dev-ops based CI/CD tools would be plus.

Qualifications
Typically seven or more years of considerable, diverse work experience in Information Technology with a minimum of five years’ experience in application development. Ideal candidate will have relevant experience either as a consultant or working for a start-up company.

This role is WAH/Flex which allows most work to be performed at home. Employees must be fully vaccinated if they choose to come onsite.

If you will be working at home occasionally or permanently, the internet connection must be obtained through a cable broadband or fiber optic internet service provider with speeds of at least 10Mbps download/5Mbps upload.

Title: Data Scientist - Machine Learning Engineer
Job_Description:
The Sr Software Development Engineer uses specialized depth and experience to oversee the writing and modifying of complex software
application programs. Leads work groups that are responsible for software development, design and quality testing. This position will create
detailed specifications or designs, conduct quality assurance reviews of peer's application programming and act as a mentor to others in
these programs. The Sr Software Development Engineer will maintain these programs by coding, testing, and debugging documents. This
position is competent to work at the highest technical level of all phases of application programming activities.

Will develop & maintain Medical Data Onboarding Abinitio ETL system. Requires Abinitio expertise & ETL knowledge

ESSENTIAL FUNCTIONS
Partner with a multiple vendors to create estimates and delivery plans for projects at a capability level. Ensure quality of
technology delivery of multiple vendors’ technology solutions for multiple concurrent projects at capability level.
Setting direction to mature the technology associated with the team. Key aspect of
this is “tech debt” removal when possible. Identify and implement process enhancement opportunities associated with
supporting the application area. Recommend actions to increase ESI and vendor partner knowledge on team. Serve as SME for
